title: Yelp : number of unique visitors 2010 to 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unique visitors in millions for 21 number of Quarters.
The maximum Unique visitors in millions 142.0 is found at Quarter Q1 '15 and the minimum is found at Q1 '10 where Quarter is 29.82.
There is a difference of 112.18 between the maximum Quarter Q1 '15 and minimum Quarter Q1 '10.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Unique visitors in millions in the y axis.
The Unique visitors in millions is highest at Quarter Q1 '15 and lowest at Quarter Q1 '10.
The second highest Unique visitors in millions is appeared to be the Quarter Q3 '14.
The maximum Quarter Q1 '15 has got 4.76 times higher Unique visitors in millions than the minimum Quarter Q1 '10.
The Quarter Q1 '15 has the highest Unique visitors in millions, followed by Q3 '14, and Q2 '14. Down to the Quarter Q1 '10 which is the lowest.
Over the past 21 Quarters, the Unique visitors in millions has climbed.
The Quarter Q1 '10 has 1.64 times less Unique visitors in millions than average.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 1817.3.
